import typography from"assets/theme/base/typography";import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";// Material Kit 2 React helper functions
import pxToRem from"assets/theme/functions/pxToRem";import rgba from"assets/theme/functions/rgba";var size=typography.size,fontWeightRegular=typography.fontWeightRegular;var white=colors.white;export default{styleOverrides:{label:{marginTop:"".concat(pxToRem(8)," !important"),fontWeight:fontWeightRegular,fontSize:size.xs,color:"#9fc9ff",textTransform:"uppercase","&.Mui-active":{fontWeight:"".concat(fontWeightRegular," !important"),color:"".concat(rgba(white.main,0.8)," !important")},"&.Mui-completed":{fontWeight:"".concat(fontWeightRegular," !important"),color:"".concat(rgba(white.main,0.8)," !important")}}}};
